steps.name: Preconditions: Login as a registered user
Fill the keyword into the Help Center search input field.
Verify search for the input query is visible on the search results page.
API requests to get categories names and IDs.
Verify category "All Categories" contains only names categories from the list of categories in the articles.
Verify other categories contain only the names of their categories in the articles.
Verify the count for each category is visible in the title.
